GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey. Where ya headed?<sp:5:0:0> As for me,
I'm gonna heal up at the ol' hot spring
while stayin' at Foothill Stable!
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Woooeee!<sp:5:1:0> That hot spring <sp:5:1:0>was
somethin' else, I tell ya.

Oh, hey. Are you lookin' for a hot spring?<sp:5:0:0>
You should know there's a great one
further up the road to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>If ya hop in, you can<clr:0000> fully heal from the
fatigue of your journey<clr:ffff>. That means you'll
feel real good after!
It's a good idea to stay at the nearby
stable and then heal up in that relaxin'
hot spring.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hear things are real bad in<clr:0000> Lanayru to
the east<clr:ffff>. They've got sticky black globs
fallin' down from the sky. Imagine that!
I think they're callin' it <clr:0000>sludge<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> Gross.
You'd better wash anything like that off in
a hot spring.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, wait. <sp:5:0:0>Guess there aren't any hot
springs in Lanayru, huh? <sp:5:0:0>Wish I could
share some of Eldin's with 'em.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey. If you're a traveler, it's a good idea
to have a couple of favorite hot springs to
rest up at.
There's a great one just up the road to
the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>If ya hop in, you can<clr:0000> fully heal from the
fatigue of your journey<clr:ffff>. That means you'll
feel real good after!
So try stayin' at the nearby stable and
then heal up in that relaxin' hot spring.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Scare>What's with that monster?<sp:5:0:0> If I hadn't run
away, I'd be in big trouble!
SavedLv3_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, you're really strong!<sp:5:0:0> You saved me!
SavedLv3_01: <sp:3:0:2:0800>You saved my life. Thanks so much!
GoRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>In Lanayru, off to the east, there are lots
of lakes and rivers and water-type stuff,
but not a single hot spring to be found.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>That's one reason I love Eldin. So many
hot springs!
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>There's a nice hot spring farther up the
road to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.

If ya hop in, you can <clr:0000>fully heal from the
fatigue of your journey<clr:ffff>. That means you'll
feel real good after!
Greeting_01:
I was just thinkin' it'd be nice to talk to
someone.

I'm glad you said somethin'!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>It's not much,<sp:5:0:0> but here's a reward for
savin' me!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey. <sp:5:0:0>Are you visitin' all the hot springs
around Eldin?<sp:5:0:0> I hope not, 'cause it's not
a great time for that.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Some <clr:0000>strange rocks <clr:ffff>have shown up in
Goron City, and ever since, all of my
Goron buddies have been actin' weird.
I used to love the hot springs at the
grub place just up the road to the
<clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>.
The place is shaped like a rock roast!
Heh. Real nice place to relax, I tell ya.
Thing is...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I don't wanna get caught up in all of that,
so I'm tryin' to steer clear for now.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>If you hadn't been here, I'd have been
a goner!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Woooeee!<sp:5:1:0> This water is perfect for a
nice, hot foot bath!

You should try relaxing in it yourself.<sp:5:0:0>
It'll make your <clr:0000>fatigue melt away<clr:ffff>. That
means you'll feel real good after!
Eldin is full of great hot springs.<sp:5:0:0>
You should try 'em all!
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks for that!<sp:5:0:0> You're not hurt, are ya?
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Phew!<sp:5:0:0> That was scary.<sp:5:1:0> Thanks for
savin' me!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ouch...<sp:5:1:0> I might be safe, <sp:5:1:0>but every inch
of me hurts...
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*pant*<sp:5:1:0> *pant*<sp:5:1:0> This is the first time
somethin' that scary has ever
happened to me. I'm shook!
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>There's a hot spring up the road to the
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>. Use it to <clr:0000>heal from your fatigue<clr:ffff>.
That means you'll feel real good after!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL_00>Eek!<sp:5:0:0> Ya know, even if you attack me,
it's not like you can eat me...
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I used to love the hot springs at that
grub spot shaped like a rock roast.

Ya know, the one just up the road to the
<clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>...

But I haven't been since those <clr:0000>strange
rocks <clr:ffff>appeared and all of my Goron
buddies started actin' weird.
StartPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey. Are ya visitin' all the hot springs
around Eldin too?<sp:5:0:0> Did ya try the waters
at <clr:0000>Bedrock Bistro<clr:ffff>?
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Wowie!<sp:5:1:0> That's some great water.<sp:5:1:0> Makes
your <clr:0000>fatigue just melt away<clr:ffff>. That means
you feel real good after!
StartPoint_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Folks always go on an' on about the
famous steak they serve there, but that's
just the beginning.
We should all be goin' on and on about
the great hot springs in front of that
grub spot!
The place is shaped like a rock roast too.
Gets the ol' imagination runnin' wild!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should see it for yourself. It's just up
the road to the <clr:0000>northeast <clr:ffff>from here.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I hate the rain. It's so cold and dreary.<sp:5:0:0>
When it stops, I'll drop by a hot spring
to warm up.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're a hot springs fan, too,
I gotta recommend a place called
<clr:0000>Lake Ferona Springs<clr:ffff>.
It's near<clr:0000> Foothill Stable<clr:ffff>, so you can
always stay there and take your time
healin' up in the spring.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lots of hot springs are bubblin' up near
<clr:0000>Foothill Stable <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Visitin' hot springs every day is good
for ya. That's what I say, anyway.
